DOC.brief_summary: The objective study assess effect low-calorie diet normal ( 18 % ) vs. high ( 35 % ) protein ( mainly come animal source ) composition body weight carbohydrate metabolism overweight obese subject pre-diabetes diabetes . A dietary intervention carry 6 month 100 subject individually randomize energy-restricted diet two type macronutrients composition : 1 ) 35 % protein , 30 % fat 35 % carbohydrates 2 ) 18 % protein , 30 % fat 52 % carbohydrate . Around 80 % total protein diet come animal source ( around 40 % lean red meat ) . Subjects provide weekly menu different recipe use part diet . Monitoring visit nutritionist perform every 15 day . At begin study , 3 6 month , follow parameter determine : anthropometric ( weight , waist circumference , body mass index body composition ) , blood pressure , dietary ( 72-hours dietary registry ) exercise biochemical analysis ( total cholesterol , triglyceride , HDL cholesterol , LDL cholesterol , apolipoproteins A1 B , iron , transfer , ferritin , uric acid , glucose , HbA1c , insulin , adiponectin resistin ) . Urine sample also collect assess microalbuminuria ureic nitrogen .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Assess Effect Normal vs. High Protein Diets Carbohydrates Metabolism Obese Subjects With Diabetes Prediabetes
DOC.criteria: Age : 1870 year old . Body mass index 27.5 40 . Steady weight ( Â± 4 kg ) last 2 month . Glycated hemoglobin 6 7 % . Antidiabetic drug ( oral subcutaneous ) last 2 month . Lipidlowering drug last 2 month . Gouty arthritis last 2 year uric acid > 735 mg/dl . Presence uncontrolled endocrinological pathology ( include hypothyroidism ) . Hepatic chronic disease ( glomerular filtration rate < 45 ml/min ) . Renal , inflammatory tumoral disease . Drugs could interfere glucose lipid metabolism androgen , corticosteroid ( except topic administration ) estrogen replacement therapy . Intake functional food plant sterol past 6 week . High alcohol intake ( > 30 g per day ) . Any serious disease involve less 1 year life expectancy , investigator judgment , limit followup homogeneous diet throughout study . Pregnancy intention pregnancy study .
